title: #1483 Bratty on Behalf of a Theme
itunes:title: #1483 Bratty on Behalf of a Theme
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the continued insanity surrounding masks and general taking of liberties by the government in the guise of public health. They go on to discuss Paul Revere and the Raiders and how their look changed drastically in a very short period of time as they review the changes in photos from the era.  

Please Support Our Sponsors:
BlindsGalore.com, tell them Adam sent you
TenThousand.CC, code ADS
Headspace.com/ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
